formattedAddress: 34 E 1st St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 34 E 1st St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Hairrari it is! After searching for a trustworthy and talented hairdresser in NYC for the past five years, I can confidently say that I've finally found the one: From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was warm and welcoming. Alex took the time to listen to my preferences and offered valuable insights that showcased her expertise. The end result was nothing short of fantastic or in Joan Crawford’s view “the most important thing a woman can have - next to talent, of course- is her hairdresser.” Thank you, Alex, for making my first visit such a positive and memorable experience!

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience getting my hair cut with Patty. I was wanting to try something new and was able to communicate my hair goals with her easily. She worked with my specific hair texture and face shape to make a calculated risk and it turned out AMAZING. I am extremely happy and confident with my new short shag cut, not to mention, it is low maintenance and easy to style. Thank you to Patty for being so welcoming, understanding and creating an incredible result!

text.text: I had an amazing experience getting my hair cut with Patty. I was wanting to try something new and was able to communicate my hair goals with her easily. Thank you to Patty for being so welcoming, understanding and creating an incredible result!

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of visiting Hairrari Barber recently and Athena, their most talented hairstylist, truly exceeded my expectations! From the moment I walked in, their warm and welcoming demeanor made me feel at ease. They took the time to listen to my hair goals and offered valuable suggestions based on their expertise.

Athena's skill and precision as a hairstylist are second to none. They transformed my hair into a work of art, and I left the salon feeling like a brand-new person. Their attention to detail and dedication to the craft were evident throughout the entire process.

Not only is Athena a master at their trade, but they also made the experience enjoyable with their friendly conversation and professionalism. I felt like I was in the hands of a true expert who genuinely cares about their clients' satisfaction.

I highly recommend Athena at Hairrari Barber to anyone in search of a top-notch hairstylist. They are a true gem in the world of hairstyling, and I can't wait to return for my next appointment with them. Thank you, Athena, for your exceptional talent and exceptional service!

originalText.text: Alex has given me such a wonderful cut two times now! i have referred many friends to her, and they are also blown away by the cut! Not only are you greeted with lovely staff, and a small unassuming vibe, you also get a fantastic cut and leave feeling confident. Alex takes time to make sure you are getting exactly what you want, and talked through the process as we went through to ensure she was doing all that I wanted! It's queer friendly and refreshing to go and get your hair cut without any sort of push towards feminine or masculine. also the prices are amazing. RUN, DONT WALK, TO ALEX!!

originalText.text: Hairarri is simply the best! The only place I get my hair cut in NYC, I always leave feeling great. I recently got my second color treatment from Athena who did a fantastic job both times. The staff are all professional and caring, making the shop a truly welcoming place for all genders and walks of life.
